content: It had rained for many days, and the road was so muddy that, at times, Pinocchio sank down almost to his knees.
translations: ita:Aveva piovuto per molti giorni, e la strada era cos√¨ fangosa che, a volte, Pinocchio sprofondava quasi fino alle ginocch
